title: Who made the new splash art for Sun Goddess Karma ?
body: I wanted to know the Artist who made it. It's so Beautiful <3. How come I can't purchase the skin ? Please someone help me . Thank you in advance.

replies.body: It's a legacy skin that's why
Thanks, it used to be not a legacy skin. Any ideas who made it?

> [{quoted}](name=ARE YOU PC BRO,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QpXpWtNz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-15T16:52:53.431+0000)
>
> It's a legacy skin that's why

What is an NA player doing on OCE boards?

Like he said, it's legacy.
You can still get it randomly from hextech crafting.
